introTitle:
Hello,
I'm Kemal
Full Stack App
Developer
frontendDesc: I learned frontend development on my own and I'm always ready to learn new things to create modern interfaces.
backendDesc: I started learning backend with the help of a mentor and then deepened my knowledge independently, creating reliable solutions.
appDesc: I mastered the basics of development with a little help, after which I continued to grow on my own, striving to create high-quality applications.
auraDesc: A professional online store built with PHP Laravel, featuring a powerful database, admin panel, and a modern design — ready for real business use.
sonusDesc: A full-featured music platform built with PHP Laravel, complete with database, mobile support, and an admin panel. Users can listen, upload music, and subscribe to artists.
drivemotoDesc: Experience the thrill of the water like never before with our state-of-the-art jet skis! Sleek, powerful, and reliable — perfect for adventure seekers. Feel the speed, feel the freedom, with HydroWave Xtreme.
aboutDesc: Detailed information about my experience, education, skills, and personal qualities.
toastSuccess: Your message has been sent successfully!
deviceNotification: Global has so much to offer that we must request you orient your device to portrait or find a larger screen. You won't be disappointed.
